statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 2 \\ -3 \\ 0 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -4 \\ 1 \\ 1 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -4 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 1 \\ -1 \\ 1 \\ 3 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
